Articles.Content:
I\'m new to the KSP, and I gotta say this is a very fun, very addicting game. I even bought the game because lets face it, we all know this is going somewhere great really fast!

I thought it was pretty funny, too, that the bottom of the command module is the rim off of a DeLorean DMC-12. Very awesome guys, but you forgot the air stem, it sold you out! =P

Hehe, jokes aside. The only problem I\'m having with the game is the lag, due to the game only utilizing one core of the processor I heard. Is there any way to boost FPS performance? I would love to achieve orbit, but I just can\'t seem to do it with the lag, makes my space ship spin out of control.
Can\'t solve your issue, but welcome to the forums!

Yeah I found out it had to do with a bunch of orbital debris not going away. It\'s woring fine now.

Also, awesome avatar. I am actually producing a mod for HW2. =P

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Very interesting catch on the wheel rim detail.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the forums.

I don\'t actually think that the bottom of the command pod is based on that, but nice find.

Anyway, enjoy your stay.

-Mincespy

I don\'t actually think that the bottom of the command pod is based on that, but nice find.

Sure it is! I do a lot of texture work, and I checked out the texture files. The command module texture has the air stem for the tire still on it.

Welcome mate, have fun. If ya need anything, let us know.

-DR
